extension.name: DigiStore Google
extension.author: foobla.com
extension.description:
This module is needed to authenticate your site with the google analytics website. Module automatically retrieves your google_ua from your com_digistore component settings. If you did not specify google_ua then module will not output anything. Overwise it places your google analytics number into the footer of your homepage when published. Google need this to be accessible for them to collect stats.
Please publish this module and change it's position from 'bottom' to one that corresponds footer and then authenticate your google analytics account from the google website. It must remain published in order to collect data. Please note: in order to use all of the analytics built into DigiStore, please edit your google analytics entry for this website and change it to an eCommerce website. This way you will be able to track all info regarding sales also.
